content: the sentosa beach crochet tank top is a fun colourful top that is perfect for summer it works up quickly and is perfect for beginners that want to try a varying stitch pattern we used a gorgeous beachy self striping yarn however this would look amazing in a solid colour too this top is so easy and great for a beginner that would like to learn some basic shaping we used one of our favourite stitches to add some change to the pattern the bead stitch creates lovely drape to the top while providing some fun stitch detail the v neck and shoulder straps flatter every body type and keep this piece modern versatile and fresh for your summer days and nights this is a free and easy crochet pattern that is made to measure size inclusive and beginner friendly the sentosa beach crochet tank top primarily uses the half_double_crochet stitch and the bead stitch this pattern has been recently updated from grade sizing to a made to measure pattern
